SELECT COUNT(*) FROM qc qc,qcdetail qd,PRODUCT p ,EMP e WHERE 1=1 AND qc.QC_NO = qd.QC_NO AND qc.EMP_NO = e.EMP_NO AND qd.PR_NO = p.PR_NO
